account.link_verified_on: Ownership of this link was checked on {date}
account.requested: Awaiting approval. Click to cancel request to connect
alert.unexpected.title: Oops!
boost_modal.combo: You can press {combo} to skip this next time
bundle_column_error.body: HOW DID YOU EVEN DO THIS.
bundle_column_error.title: THE GRUBWORK IS BROKEN
column_back_button.label: Abscond
column.heading: Misc
compose_form.direct_message_warning: This post will only be sent to the mentioned players.
compose_form.hashtag_warning: This post won't be listed under any hashtag as it is unlisted. Only public posts can be searched by hashtag.
compose_form.lock_disclaimer: Your account is not {locked}. Anyone can connect to you to view your client-only posts.
compose_form.sensitive.unmarked: Media is not marked as sensitive
confirmations.block.message: Are you sure you want to cull {name}?
confirmations.delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
confirmations.delete_list.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this chumroll?
confirmations.domain_block.message: Are you really, really sure you want to cull the {domain}? In most cases a few targeted cullings or mutes are sufficient and preferable. You will not see content from that timeline in the Doomed Timelines or your pesterlog. Your client players from that timeline will be removed.
confirmations.mute.message: Are you sure you want to mute {name}?
confirmations.redraft.message: Are you sure you want to delete this status and re-draft it? Captchalogues and rebubbles will be lost, and replies to the original post will be orphaned.
confirmations.reply.message: Replying now will overwrite the message you are currently composing. Are you sure you want to proceed?
confirmations.unfollow.message: Are you sure you want to disconnect from {name}?
embed.instructions: Embed this status on your website by copying the code below.
embed.preview: Here is what it will look like:
emoji_button.label: Insert emoji
empty_column.blocks: You haven't culled any users yet.
You haven't culled any users yet.
empty_column.community: Trollian is empty. Write something publicly to get the ball rolling!
empty_column.direct: You don't have any memos yet. When you send or receive one, it will show up here.
empty_column.domain_blocks: There are no culled timelines yet.
empty_column.favourited_statuses: You don't have any posts captchalogued in your sylladex yet. When you captchalogue one, it will show up here.
empty_column.favourites: No one has captchalogued this post yet. When someone does, they will show up here.
empty_column.follow_requests: You don't have any connection requests yet. When you receive one, it will show up here.
empty_column.hashtag: There is nothing in this hashtag yet.
empty_column.home: Your Chumlog is empty! Visit {public} or use search to get started and meet other users.
empty_column.list: There is nothing in this chumroll yet. When players in this chumroll post new statuses, they will appear here.
empty_column.lists: You don't have any chumrolls yet. When you create one, it will show up here.
empty_column.mutes: You haven't muted any users yet.
empty_column.notifications: There is nothing in your pesterlog yet. Interact with others to start the conversation.
empty_column.public: There is nothing here! Write something publicly, or manually follow users from othertimelines to fill it up
getting_started.heading: Getting started
getting_started.open_source_notice: Mastodon is open source software. You can contribute or report issues on GitHub at {github}.
hashtag.column_settings.tag_toggle: Include additional tags for this column
introduction.federation.federated.text: Public posts from other timelines of the Doomed Timelines will appear here.
introduction.federation.home.headline: Chumplog
introduction.federation.home.text: Posts from players you connect with will appear in your Chumplog. You can connect to anyone from any timeline!
introduction.federation.local.headline: Trollian
introduction.federation.local.text: Public posts from people on Trollian will appear here.
introduction.interactions.favourite.head: Sylladex
introduction.interactions.favourite.text: You can captchalogue a post for later, and let the author know that you liked it, by captchaloguing it.
introduction.interactions.reblog.text: You can share other people's posts with your connected players by rebubbling them.
introduction.interactions.reply.headline: Reply
introduction.interactions.reply.text: You can reply to other people's and your own posts, which will chain them together in a conversation.
introduction.welcome.headline: First steps
introduction.welcome.text: Welcome to Trollian! In a few moments, you'll be able to broadcast messages and talk to your friends across a wide variety of timelines. But here on {domain}, is special—it hosts your profile, so remember its name.
keyboard_shortcuts.column: to focus a status in one of the columns
keyboard_shortcuts.down: to move down in the list
keyboard_shortcuts.heading: Keyboard shortcuts
keyboard_shortcuts.toot: to start a brand new post
keyboard_shortcuts.up: to move up in the list

notifications.clear_confirmation: Are you sure you want to permanently clear all your notifications?

privacy.local.long: Post to local timeline and followers only
regeneration_indicator.label: Loading…
report.forward_hint: The account is from another timeline. Send an anonymized copy of the report there as well?
report.hint: The report will be sent to your timeline's moderators. You can provide an explanation of why you are reporting this account below:
search_popout.tips.full_text: Simple text returns statuses you have written, captchalogued, rebubbled, or have been mentioned in, as well as matching usernames, display names, and hashtags.
search_popout.tips.text: Simple text returns matching display names, usernames and hashtags
search_results.statuses_fts_disabled: Searching toots by their content is not enabled on this timeline.
status.admin_status: Open this status in the moderation interface
status.reblogs.empty: No one has rebubbled this post yet. When someone does, they will show up here.

time_remaining.minutes: {number, plural, one {# minute} other {# minutes}} left

ui.beforeunload: Your draft will be lost if you leave Trollian.
